committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water, Power and Offshore Energy Resources

official_title: To convey fee title to Pershing County Water Conservation District, certain Federal lands known as the Battle Mountain Community Pastures, in recognition that the land was initially acquired by the District and subsequently transferred to the United States for the Humboldt River Project.
short_title: Battle Mountain Pasture Restoration Act of 1991

summary.text: Battle Mountain Pasture Restoration Act of 1991 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey the Battle Mountain Community Pasture, Lander County, Nevada, to the Pershing County Water Conservation District.

titles.title: Battle Mountain Pasture Restoration Act of 1991

To convey fee title to Pershing County Water Conservation District, certain Federal lands known as the Battle Mountain Community Pastures, in recognition that the land was initially acquired by the District and subsequently transferred to the United States for the Humboldt River Project.
